thread.title: Taking off: what’s new in the world
thread.title_full: Taking off: what’s new in the world | The Sunday Times

author: The Sunday Times
title: Taking off: what’s new in the world
text:
Welcome to Thomas Land, at Drayton Manor Theme Park Schedule time with the Fat Controller
Any Thomas & Friends fans in your household? Here’s your chance to score big with them. Drayton Manor Theme Park is offering the chance to have Thomas Land — the spin-off attraction from the children’s TV show — exclusively to yourself. The winner will get to enjoy the Staffordshire theme park for a full hour before the gates open on September 5, and be able to share the experience with up to nine friends and family. With a VIP photoshoot with the Fat Controller and some 25 train-based rides and attractions to try out, they’ll be chuffed.
Competition ends August 22; draytonmanor.co.uk/thomas-land/ultimate-competition
Art and sole
They may have all the off-road credibility of a lovingly polished urban SUV, but the desert boot is an indisputable style icon. Now, to mark the 65th anniversary of their conception in Cairo by Nathan Clark, of the famous footwear dynasty,
